General.Name: Kuang Hong Arts Management
General.Description: Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation operates as a live entertainment company in Taiwan. The company produces and promotes live concerts, exhibitions, musicals, theatre, and sport activities. The company was formerly known as Yucai International Marketing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation in July 2014. Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation was founded in 1993 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
